Montebello Barnyard Zoo.knownFor: “ Sooo much fun! The kids and adults will love this zoo! ” Reviewed May 28, 2013 We go every year to this hometown zoo in Montebello. Its east of Los Angeles less than 30 minutes. Its reasonably priced and is less crowded than the big zoos. The funny zebra with his big teeth was the highlight of our last trip. Dont forget to pick up animal feed when you get your tickets. You can have your...
